subject: Tennis
Wimbledon Tennis Tournament
lead_paragraph: Lucas Gómez, a surprise winner in the Gerry Weber Open junior tournament this month, lost his father at age 10 when their bus was ambushed by a gunman.
snippet: Lucas Gómez, a surprise winner in the Gerry Weber Open junior tournament this month, lost his father at age 10 when their bus was ambushed by a gunman.
